scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm install --dev && cd client && npm install --dev && cd server && npm install --dev
scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
